oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Vector Futures: New Paradigms for Imag(in)ing the Humanities
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kirschenbaum, Matthew
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: raster image
vector image
photorealism
Image processing--Digital techniques
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This essay examines the “agon” between raster and vector images, photorealism and algorithmic design, examining the theoretical implications of privileging one over the other and implicitly delineating possible epistemological futures.(pdf for download--right click or control click to save)
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: paj:The Journal of the Initiative for Digital Humanities, Media, and Culture; Vol. 2 No. 1 (2010): Visualizing the Archive
